nio/PhillipsHue.description: This block will control the color of Phillips Hue lights through a hub on the same network, using the Phillips Hue API.

hub_config.title: Hub Configuration
hub_config.description: Configuration for the Hub. IP address of the hub. Your unique user id obtained from the API and the light to control.

kill_switch.title: Turn off Light at Service Stop?
kill_switch.description: When selected this will turn off the light when the nio service stops.

light_config.title: Light Configuration
light_config.description: Configuration for the power and color of the light. on_state, hue, sat, and brightness are integers that describe the power and color of the light.
